thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Marie

author: Marie
title: Marie
text: I was very skeptical on purchasing high end glasses on the Internet . It was a great price and hard to refuse. The day after I placed an order I noticed all the bad reviews this company was getting on Facebook . I wanted to cancel my order but it was already shipped. My experience was EXCELLENT. Customer service by email was great, my purchase arrived in 3 days with no hassle. I believe they are authentic and came in mint condition. Not 100% believer if they are authentic , the knock offs keep getting better. Still a happy customer with the quality and cost of the glasses.
